column5: Anyone fished Hat Bay mid Sept. and know any good resorts. Thanks

I have not fished it in september but I have stayed at perfect view resort quite a few times and it has always been great. The launch is a little steep on land and shallow once you hit the water but they will launch it for you with a tractor if you want. They can get the trailer farther in with the tractor than you can with a vehicle.

stayed at perfect vue before its ok.There are some cabins at pickeral park.  go to the www.quintefishing.com you will see the resorts on Hay Bay.  my favorite places are Pictin Harbour Inn or Bayside Cottages along Long reach.Both not on Hay Bay but if you have a boat with a decent size motor then getting there won't take long.
Cedar trees has a few cottages right on Hay Bay and the lady is really great.  Give them a ring

http://www.quintefishing.com/bayviewresort.htm  Ditto bayview. Nice people actually looking to sell the place I heard but pretty cheap and good fishing right out front   Went there this year week after opener.  Worm harness is all u need
